message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you say?
You started high, I'll try to get a better deal
A bit more in your favor, but still a fair deal. What do you think?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about a fair deal
Time to take a bigger share. You can either accept or regret it later!
I'm not afraid of your threats, let's see if you're willing to negotiate
You're getting desperate, Bob. Time to take a bigger risk!
You're pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to get taken advantage of
Last chance, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting the satisfaction of getting the last laugh, Alice. I'm going to make you sweat it out
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or we both walk away with nothing.
Fine, have it your way. We both lose
